Format code — render_code
text: Formatter un bout de code pour le recopier dans un mail, un pdf, un document...

title: Format code — render_code
code: render_code(   output = "word",   browser = getOption("browser"),   eval = FALSE,   font_size = 12 )

title: Format code — render_code
code: render_code(     output = "pdf",     eval = FALSE,     font_size = 16 ) #> Error: 'readClipboard' is not an exported object from 'namespace:utils'
